snippet: Days in advance of the official vote count, Indian exit polls point to a clear majority for the Bharatiya Janata Party.
abstract: Exit polls suggest voters in India's parliamentary election will deliver mandate for Bharatiya Janata Party's Narendra Modi; Modi is a Hindu nationalist who has promised to create manufacturing jobs and overhaul the country's infrastructure.

byline.original: By ELLEN BARRY and NEHA THIRANI BAGRI
byline.contributor: Ellen Barry reported from New Delhi, and Neha Thirani Bagri from Mumbai. Hari Kumar contributed reporting from New Delhi.

lead_paragraph: Days in advance of the official vote count, Indian exit polls point to a clear majority for the Bharatiya Janata Party.

headline.main: India’s Voters Expected to Give Modi a Mandate
headline.print_headline: India’s Voters Expected to Give Modi a Mandate
